reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: Three way operation does not work when the load is turned off at this switch. When you do, both outputs are switched off which prevents the load from being turned on subsequently from either of the other two switches - as required by true three way operation. Existing wiring is good - all works as expected when a mechanical three way switch is employed.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2024
reviews.title: Three Way Operation - Not!

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: When "off" the LED lights continue to flicker lightly and won't turn entirely off. This should not be advertised for use with LED lights.

reviews.title: Doesn't work with LEDs

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: I bought this to control a 24W LED bedroom ceiling light. Control range is excellent, varying smoothly from dim candle light to daylight. But unfortunately, there is a bright green LED below the switch rocker that illuminates when the fixture is turned off. I can literally read by unwanted glow I tried to mask this with carefully placed electric tape, but the entire ring around the switch rocker still glows bright enough to interfere with normal night-time sleep. By resorting to reading the fine print on the backside of the installation guide, i learned the programming steps to make all the LEDs, including my bright green nemesis, to turn off after 5 seconds. I have made peace with the control and bumped my rating to 5-star.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.title: Super bright green LED - read the fine print to control

reviews.text: As stated in the installation instructions: The Decora DDL06 dimmer is not compatible with standard 3-way or 4-way switches. It must be used with a Decora digital remote for multi-location control, such as DD00R-L. Note: The matching remote must be installed in a wall box with a Line Hot and a Neutral connection. see less

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: This item number (DDL06-1LZ) is compatible with Apple Homekit. If you have a different smart home system you'll need a different Leviton part number. It is really cool to say "Hey Siri, set dining room light to half brightness" and it happens instantly. Be sure to read the instructions carefully when installing, especially if you have a 3-way situation. I have a number of Leviton smart switches and they all work flawlessly. A couple of them shipped with old firmware and would not respond to an iPhone running ios 14 to perform the setup. Using an ipad instead worked fine. Once enrolled with the ipad, the firmware was updated and then it worked with the iphone and the rest of the Apple smart home.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2021
reviews.title: Works great with Apple Homekit

reviews.text: Installation is correct with ground - tested with meter. However the switch started turning off (by itself) intermittently. Then it intermittently stopped turn on (no lights visible on the switch itself). When it was working there was also a delay to turn on. The dim-on function is fine, but the switch doesn't give the responsive feel of an analog one. I'll be replacing.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: Handful of features to choose from during install/set-up, including, max brightness/dim, speed of dim, led indicators on/off etc.. I've used Leviton zwave switches in rooms where I want 'connected' functionality. These unconnected digital dimmers look the same on the wall as the zwaves (they have rocker dimmer not a slider). They don't run hot like the non-digital slider dimmers do. Takes-up a bit more space in wall box than the Leviton non-digital dimmers.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2019
reviews.title: Handful of features to choose from during install/set-up...

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: This dimmer works very well with LED bulbs, and the coordinating remotes are great. If you have older Levition Vizia dimmers/remotes, this product is a direct replacement and solves the problem of ghosting LEDs with the older product. There is one minor flaw, however: the rocker arm toggle on the right side of the switch frequently pops out of position into "air gap" mode, however I have found a workaround. You need to tweak the wallplate so it buts up tightly against the right hand side of the switch, leaving a slight gap on the left hand side (see my photo). This provides support for the toggle assembly and helps prevents the plastic from flexing outwards and popping out of position during use. This is a design flaw on Leviton's part, as they designed the switch face about a millimeter too narrow. They should design a modified switch face that addresses this issue.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2018
reviews.title: Good dimmer for use with LED bulbs

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: Great quality standard 'rocker' style dimmer switch that works with all types of light bulbs. I've never had a problem with Leviton switches before - I've got them in most rooms of the house, in standard switches, dimmers, and wifi-enabled switches. This one works great and it's as easy to install as any of them. The only "negative" is that it's a bit pricey for a non-wifi or smart switch... I didn't give it 5-stars because it doesn't feel as solid when using it as some of the other "luxury" switches, and there's a bit of space between the toggle switch and dimmer piece and the surrounding case.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2017
reviews.title: Good, well-made option for a standard switch

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: This switch is attractive and ergonomically designed and comes with three interchangeable colored face plates (white, ivory, light almond). The dimmer works very well with retrofitted LED lights. Unfortunately the screw terminals were not designed with ease of attachment in mind. The wires I attached them to were heavy gauge and it was difficult to attach them to the terminals. In addition, the wiring directions were not designed for use by the amateur electrician in mind. As a result it took far longer to install this than I had hoped.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2017
reviews.title: Works well but difficult to install

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: Great dimmer switch! We're using it in our kitchen, where we have 10 recessed LED lights. The kitchen was really bright with all those lights, so the dimmer switch gives us the option to soften the light when needed. Was pretty easy to put in, but we've done it before. We have some other Leviton switches and have been very happy with performance, and I'm sure this dimmer switch will be the same. If not, I'll update this review.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2017
reviews.title: Great dimmer switch

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: One hour later, after what I *thought* would be a trivial install... I love the operation of this switch. The fade on effect is very nice. The "locator" light doubles as an intensity indicator. Typically installation should be trivial. Overall the instructions are well written. What caught me was my house wiring was "wrong". Quickly reading the instructions (who *critically* *studies* instructions?) it seemed obvious to screw the black wire into the black terminal and the white wire into the other (red) terminal. Oops! What they should clearly label is the black terminal should be connected to the hot wire (you should have a multi meter to test your wiring). To further compound the problem the trouble shooting section does NOT cover this situation. They give four possible causes for the problem I encountered, but failed to include the fifth possible case of the hot and neutral wires being reversed. The problem was confusing for me because a light would light up and operate if you unscrewed the light bulb and screwed it back in. (first I was using the original incandescent bulb (brain dead simple, should always work) then I switched to a new LED bulb (which is how I discovered it would light up upon initially screwing in the light bulb), then tried yet another LED bulb (which was clearly marked as compatible with dimmer switches) at that point I realized something was messed up with the switch and used my multi meter to check which wire was *actually* the hot wire. Swap the wires and presto it works perfectly. After all the hassle of getting it to work, it's tempting to only rate this three stars. But most people won't encounter this issue (most house wiring is correct, right?). Note: this switch is programmable! Programming modes A and B allow you to alter all kinds of things like fade on / off rate, maximum brightness, minimum brightness and other settings.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2017
reviews.title: Too smart for it's own good

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: This is a great rocker dimmer switch in Decora style by Levition. The feel of the rocker is excellent. Spring loading of the switch creates a nice end point detent feeling. The dimming up / down lever has a good feedback click to it and actuates the dimming process reliably. Well made and substantial. Runs cooler than traditional dimmers. 5 stars.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2017
reviews.title: Quality Dimmer

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: I thought this might be like the classic Leviton rocker switch where the button rocks to one side or the other. But it feels more like a momentary clicky switch that bounces back to the middle position every time you press the button. I prefer the classic feel where the switch changes its position. Here’s a video that shows how it moves.

reviews.title: Elegant dimmer switch that suits most room styles

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: I have an older home with no real ground. Circuits are instead protected with GFCI/AFCI outlets. This has never been an issue for dimmers or switches. Traditional analog switches only require the line/load wires (black from circuit breaker and black to lighting). Digital dimmers have always used the white neutral wire for power, which allows them to be on even when the lights are not in use. This provides power for the dimming on/off animations and any "smart" features like Wifi or Bluetooth. This Leviton switch actually used the ground instead, which I guess is compatible with code requirements because it is low voltage. Regardless of the reason, this means that a true ground is needed. I had to use these in another home. They have now made this clearer in the description, but it is still easy to miss because it is such an odd choice, and one that I hope is not a trend. Otherwise, this is decent dimmer that works well for LED lighting. There are some basic settings to tune to dimming range, and the dimming animation makes turning on the lights less jarring.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2017
reviews.title: True Ground Required

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: Leviton DDL06-1LZ Decora Digital Dimmer Great Dimming. Great Style. The DDL06-1LZ Decora Digital Dimmer features a separate On/Off switch that preserves the selected brightness setting and offers the flexibility to modify the dimming range to optimize low light level performance when required on certain LED or CFL bulbs. Its slim, compact housing fits easily into a standard wallbox and is suitable for multi-gang installations with other Decora products. Screw terminals with back wire capability add to the ease of installation. The Decora Digital Dimmer comes packaged in White with Ivory and Light Almond color change kits. Additional color change kits are available in Black, Brown and Gray. Digital Technology for Advanced Operation The DDL06-1LZ Decora Digital Dimmer has been designed to control a wide range of dimmable LED, dimmable CFL and incandescent bulbs. Users have the ability to adjust the setting for any dimmable CFL and LED bulbs requiring fine-tuning. Selectable fade rates and minimum brightness levels that let you enjoy the ideal light level day or night. Digital circuitry provides a pleasing light level, as well as 'soft on' and 'fade off' for transitions that are gentle to the eyes. For added convenience, the dimmer recalls the last set brightness level every time you push the pad to turn it on. It also features an ergonomic design, innovative contoured geometry, and a high-gloss finish. An optional LED locator light makes it easy to find the device in the dark. Save Energy and Create Ambiance For a quick, low-cost, energy-saving upgrade to your home, simply replace any standard light switch with the Decora Digital Dimmer. Dimming the lights by 25 percent reduces energy consumption by 20 percent and extends the life by four times. Energy Save Mode allows you to program a decreased maximum brightness level, so you automatically save energy every time you turn the lights on. The ability to control the light level also means you can get the perfect ambiance for any activity.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2017
reviews.title: An excellent dimmer which doesn't hum and provides full range dimming. Check for a neutral (white) wire before purchasing.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: Setup was straight forward. I hooked it up to a single pole and had all the wires ready to go. This does require a ground wire (typically green) or it will not function. This is a soft-touch switch, which means it doesn't have to be pushed down hard to operate. The switch will remember where you set the dimmer level, so turning it back on it will keep it at the same setting unless the user changes it. Big plus! A little green light is illuminated on the side to show what the light density is. Highly recommend.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2017
reviews.title: easy setup and functions perfectly

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Decora Digital Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, DDL06-1LZ, White
reviews.text: works good but if used in a 3 way configuration be sure you have enough wires for your specific application as these switches need their own power and neutral along with a wire to transmit a signal to another switch and then finally out to the lights. in my case I needed 4 wires to get the power where it needed to go.
